entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET October 2022 Updates #237
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-41032 | .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #236

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI failure in Wasm Linux: Could not restore / could not find `Microsoft.NET.Workload.Mono.ToolChain.net7.Manifest-7.0.100/7.0.0-ci` #76908
  • CI failure in coreclr linux arm crossbuild checked: Generate CORE_ROOT dotnet restore error #76906
  • CI build failure in Linux Musl Arm64: Generating native code, crossgen2.ilc.rsp exited with code 139 (segmentation fault) #76905
  • Refactor and Update Main Workflow Documentation #76896
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add freezing APIs to JsonTypeInfo #76893
    8.0.0
  • Consider expanding number formatting cache to larger values #76888
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_PriorityQueue<Int32, Int32> #76887
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #76886
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #76885
  • [Ubuntu 22.10] error: definition of builtin function '__cpuid' when using clang-15: could the fix be backported to 6.0.1XX? #76882
  • [Android] Inherited internal properties are not returned via reflection #76881
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_23159\\GitHub_23159\\GitHub_23159.cmd #76880
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'putArgRegNode->gtOper == GT_PUTARG_REG' #76879
    8.0.0
  • Directory.GetFiles throws DirectoryNotFoundException if path contains ''$'\240''a' on Linux #76877
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] RootHidden is not working correctly in DebuggerTypeProxy #76876
    8.0.0
  • NET 6 Application crashes without a StackTrace (I've a MiniDump) Code: 0xc0000374 #76875
  • JIT: suboptimal block layout #76872
    Future
  • runtimelab yml no longer works as template for experiment branches #76866
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\generics\\Layout\\General\\Base02b_seq_ser\\Base02b_seq_ser.cmd #76862
    8.0.0
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure CLR Error on .NET 6.0 #76861
  • Assert failure: (last_plug_size & (sizeof(PTR_PTR) - 1)) == 0 #76858
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: (size (xl) > 0) #76857
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Cloning/Runtime_61040_5/Runtime_61040_5.sh #76855
    8.0.0
  • IOCompletionCallback of ThreadPoolBoundHandle causes the app to crash #76852
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure: GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #76856
    8.0.0
  • BigInteger ModPow or aritchmeric within internal buffer handling #76842
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reduce LSDA size #76895
    8.0.0
  • Investigate simplifying runtime test xunit wrapper generation #42969
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\mcc\\interop\\mcc_i61\\mcc_i61.cmd #76865
    8.0.0
  • Office Interop on .net core not working with Office 2021, but works on framework. #76833
  • [API Proposal]: DispatchProxy.Create<TProxy>(Type interfaceType) #67444
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact randomly yielding wrong DateTime.Kind #76037
  • .NET CLR profiling API does not return ELEMENT_TYPE_GENERICINST on generic method #75903
    8.0.0
  • Exception Type not loged to EventLog when a Exception crashes the application #76741
  • Strange performance loss when using conditional Vector<T> and CopyBlockUnaligned #76844
  • Blazor Wasm Crashes if another wasm instance is running in the service worker. #76026
    6.0.11
  • An overwritten ToString method does not show the content of an item in Blazor WASM (while DebuggerDisplay works now) #76748
  • OpenXml throws a different exception given identical code and similar build configuration for two distinct solutions. Why? #76744
    Future
  • JIT: Optimize "X & 1 == 0" to "X & 1" #61412
    Future
  • Microsoft.NETCore.App.Crossgen2.sfxproj in source-build #74721
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: A ALC must be unload. #76864
  • Socket.Poll(μsTimeout, SelectMode.SelectRead) behavior is confusing #32719
    Future
  • JsonDocument.GetString implementation is not thread safe #76440
    Future
  • Console.In.Read{Line,ToEnd} don't recognize EOF from terminal #76821
    7.0.0
  • Add `TransactionManager.ImplicitDistributedTransactions` #76469
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'h->bbFallsThrough()' #76346
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.WildcardExpressions api #74862
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2017800 #76907
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check if interval interferes with the call #76904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • retire EOL Fedora 34 #76902
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoid exception when calling WhenAny with a null parameter #76900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. (#76540) #76899
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase distributed transaction test timeout for MSDTC communication failures #76892
    area-System.Transactions
  • Only copy coreclr binaries to core_root when targeting coreclr #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for using sccache on Unix #76889
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix profiler tail call insertion logic for FIELD_LIST #76883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Fix usage of implicit pointer types in a few more places… #76878
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • De-duplicate Unix Environment variables between Mono and native AOT #76853
  • [JIT] x86 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Enable stable branding for GA #76849
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Bump intellisense to include latest docs for RC2 #76846
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Bump intellisense to include latest docs for RC2 #76847
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix gc hole in Frozen.cs #76868
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update Arm64 cross build container #76897
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Double the size of new frozen segments #76870
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Doc improvements #76863
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT] Don't unnecessarily allocate ObjectNodeSection objects #76894
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #76884
    area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression in `JsonIgnoreAttribute` handling of unsupported property types #76869
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Reduce CoreCLR PAL #76832
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • [test][tvos] Disable InvalidIVSizes overflow case for tvos #76725
    area-System.Security, os-tvos
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Abs intrinsics for Amd64 #76668
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugger behavior when the type has ToString method overridden #76780
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Ensure reflection property metadata is instantiated lazily #76828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix JsonDocument thread safety. #76716
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76669
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions (#76376) #76838
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix loop canonicalization for call-finally case #76734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Reduce CoreCLR PAL" #76860
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Improve performance of integer formatting #76726
    area-System.Runtime
  • Use property AutoreleasePoolSupport in test #76800
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution

Updated

  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add the ability to start and stop IHostedService instances concurrently #75894
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Add specific formatting string for SSA numbers #76706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ReadOnly{Observable}Collection/Dictionary.Empty #76764
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryPrimitives.ReverseEndianness for spans of elements #76339
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Use metadata names for SIMD intrinsic method recognition #76786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include hostcommon sources in hostfxr static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM : cannot get empty string for unbox stub #2027

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add support for GT_STORE_BLK #2005

Updated

  • remove installer leg requirement #2026
  • Green thread objects #2023
  • Make FCall transition go through lambda that can be translated into a functionpointer + pointer arg parameter #2019
  • Instrument RandomAccess.Read/Write for green threads #2020

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSB4242: SDK Resolver Failure due to System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException #28488
  • Formatting with multi-line raw literals indents with `dotnet run` #28478
  • Trying to build with PublishAot=true on Mac ARM results in restore failure #28475
  • dotnet build/run failing (almost) siliently Ubuntu Linux #28471
  • [NETSDKE2E]Workloads are not displayed in "dotnet workload list" after upgrade from NET RC2 to NET7 RTM. #28451
  • [NETSDKE2E]Error happens "Workload installation failed: Access to the path 'C:\ProgramData\dotnet\workloads\Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task.Msi.x64\7.0.0-rtm.22507.1\msi.json' is denied." when instaling workload using another account. #28450
  • [Megathread] Infrastructure Issues #28442

Closed

  • Unable to build .NET Core 3.1 or .NET 6.0 after installed .NET 7.0 RTM SDK #28027
  • 'dotnet store' cannot find System.Runtime #28462

PullRequests

Created

  • Stable branding #28485
    Area-Infrastructure
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28483
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GA / 7.0.1xx Internal -> External Port] Fix SDK Temp Paths #28477
    Area-Infrastructure, Priority:0
  • [Internal -> External Port (7.0.1xx-RC2)] Fix SDK Temp Paths #28476
    Area-Infrastructure, Priority:0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28474
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #28470
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #28469
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #28468
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #28467
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28446
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28445
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28444

Merged

  • Add an official builder assembly attribute #28400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Reference net7.0 version of msbuild for source-build #28425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28398
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert perma-escaping of semicolons and support semicolon-delimited unquoted property values #27859
    Bug, Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 6.0.11
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28447
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add actionable output to templating destructive changes notification #28428
    Area-dotnet new
  • Update branding to 6.0.306 #28323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.403 #28324
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2017846 #27667
  • Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. #28380
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense for "sha1" is not optimal #64646
    17.5
  • The implicit operator allows converting null literal to non-nullable type without CS8600 #64638
    Backlog
  • INamedType.ToDisplayString omits delegate's parameters #64632
    17.5
  • The generate method fix in VB generates a delegate param while AddressOf is not used #64631
  • Adding a method which can add references from NuGet #64629
  • Compiler trouble due to nint/nuint and IntPtr/UIntPtr? #64628

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33011.173 #64652
  • Intellisense yield return completion #40949
    17.5
  • CS8629 false positive for nested ImmutableArray #64645
  • Convert to Struct refactoring is broken for VB #64639
  • Razor compilation fails on dotnet 6 project with 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 #64499
    17.4
  • Constant evaluation is not IEEE-754 compliant #64595
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly functions with bool/char parameters should be an error #64086
  • Confusing error message mentioning `WindowsRuntime` when trying to await an `IAsyncEnumerable` #64170
  • Add supporting for enumerating Embedded Resources for source generators #63941
  • Source generator exceptions should be shown as errors, rather than warnings #64175
  • Cached analyzer is applied instead of updated one #29939
    Backlog
  • Avoid reparsing on solution open #60014
  • Do we need to support RQNames for functions with function-pointer-typed arguments? #46029
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not yield the UI thread between an undo unit being created and committed #64651
    Area-IDE
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build. #64650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Save CustomAttributesBag before post decoding well known attributes. #64649
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Load CompletionProvider from references in background" #64648
    Area-IDE
  • VB ConvertTupleToStruct should not include NullableAttributes in it #64647
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Improve GenerateMethod for VB implicit call case #64635
    Area-IDE
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers
  • Expand IOperation check to lambdas #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use CWT for Task<Compilation> #64623
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [LSP] Pass in Razor language server kind #64642
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't suggest name after unbound yield identifier #64641
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Update NuGet Package history #64643
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Include preview version when installing .NET runtime #64618
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing version #64636
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert: Revert "Set val escape on expression variables (#64414)" #64633
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis (#64470) #64619
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, OnDeckForQB, 17.4
  • Log exception directly at the point where it occurs #64637
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove lock from MAS code to prevent UI delays #64620
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Workaround crash in spellchecking in snippet layer #64622
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Set val escape on expression variables" #64627
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #64424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Test flaky tests #64617
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Make IPreviewService async #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Change operator when negating relational patterns with numeric values #64594
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE
  • Try add committed Suggestion item to completion MRU #64586
    Area-IDE
  • Fix early attribute decoding when an argument is interpolated string #64612
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Set val escape on expression variables (#64414) #64621
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't format regions inside inactive conditionals #64551
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CertificateFailedValidation event is not logging the ChainErrors as expected. #44484
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44482
  • Update rebranding instructions to include steps for updating template precedence values #44481
    8.0-MQ
  • Perf regression: json_netty #44478
  • in Blazor wasm iframe not load the LocalStorage or IndexedDB #44468
  • RDLC work on a Linux based environment #44466
  • The synchronous method is not supported by 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.ClientHandler' #44464
  • DotNetCore API hosted via Azure App Service is stripping leading url encoded forward slash from route values. #44461

Closed

  • VS client generation causes build errors for default template #43987
  • CORS issue in .NET Core 6 API #44384
  • DateOnly and TimeOnly are displayed as complex objects in open-api schemas rather simple string #37045
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `bind:after` with asynchronous method causes multiple renders when done. #43195
    7.0.0
  • Perf regression: plaintext_actix #44455
  • Curious what is the drawback of removing the reference of _framework/blazor.server.js from my blazor server project? #44444
  • Author CodeTour for Blazor navigation area #33210
    Backlog
  • ASP.NET MVC: updated model data is not recognised in view #28026
    Backlog
  • Considerable overhead in middleware pipeline #44311
  • Give the Blazor project a long name then F5 to run VS, the project name is not fully displayed on the web page. #44467
  • dotnet dev-certs https --export-path fails with UnauthorizedAccessException #44362
  • Exception Handler handling OperationCanceledException but not getting expected HTTP response #44460

PullRequests

Created

  • Update project template precedence values #44479
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Use Path.GetTempFileName() for 600 Unix file mode #44477
  • update contributing guidelines to state that Squash is preferred #44475
  • Add windows auth to path selection sample #44472
    area-security
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [3.1] Merge internal commits #44474
    3.1.x
  • [Blazor] Update bind:set,after runtime apis #44412
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #44471
    6.0.x
  • Bump NuGet.Protocol from 5.8.1 to 5.9.3 in /eng/tools/BaselineGenerator #44480
    area-infrastructure, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, .NET, 8.0-preview1
  • Update protobuf version #44450
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Merge from internal rc2 branch #44473
    tell-mode, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ef Core 7 RC2 NamingConvention get_EntityTypeAddedConventions method not found #29327
  • How could I set the name of a shadow property for a foreign key? #29322
  • Compiled Models #29320
  • Removal of a new optional navigation entity does not reset foreign key current value #29318
  • FromSqlRaw + OwnedEntity + Where on PK throws #29317
  • TPT query perf regression in EF7 #29315
  • System.Drawing.Common is transitively referenced by Micosoft.Data.SqlClient 5.0.1 meaning that AWS Lambda now fails #29316

Closed

  • Decimal Parameters in query default to Precision=18, Scale=2 #29313
  • Why was my previous bug about windows 11 and ef core toooling not working #29319
  • What is the best way to get the database column name of Entity Property (EF core 7 RC2) #29321
  • Convert.ToDecimal in Projections #29282
  • Add support for validating data and reporting problems during data migrations #29299
  • Add a way to delete seed made with HasData without removing data in the database #29273
  • SQLiteFunction not working #29233
  • dbcontext scaffold introduces InvalidOperationException on Join Entity configuration for many-to-many relationships #29218
  • DbContext Instance gets Disposed. #29197
  • Update SqlClient from 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 #29301
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29326
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29325
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #29323
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #29324
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.30.1 to 3.31.0 #29310
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Use type mapping from IDbFunction while translating (#27995) #29216
    Servicing-consider
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 #29312
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
